item.description:
Restaurant Week! Yay!

Restaurant: Twenty Milk Street

This restaurant is 3-courses for $30!!

Here is the menu for the $30 3 course meal:

http://www.mainerestaurantweek.com/restaurant/149/Twenty-Milk-Street

Restaurant Meetup Policy

Please remember, RSVP yes only if you plan to attend to allow us to make reservations. If you RSVP yes and change your mind on attending, you MUST provide at least 24 hours notice or you will be considered a "No Show". After 2 "no shows" to restaurant meetups, you will no longer be allowed to attend restaurant meetups.
item.how_to_find_us: The reservation is under Rebecca. I'll be there 5-10 minutes early. After 7, ask the hostess for our table.
item.name: Restaurant Week! Twenty Milk Street
